name: Candy Pop Story
description:
Luckily you've arrived a great place with Candy Sweet Story. Whip your way through hundreds of sweet match 3 challenges by matching candies in epic adventure! Master your moves strategically and match up more than three identical candies to be rewarded with a variety of board clearing boosters.

How to play:
- Swap and gather 3 or more of the same candies blast to score points
- Try to solve puzzles by breaking bread and ice barriers
- Collect adorable cakes for the preparation of chick levels
- Match 4 or more candies to create candy boosters and power-ups
- Achieve the target points to level up

Game features:
- Candy Sweet Story with 192 compelling levels in different sceneries
- Completely free to play
- Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
- Suitable for all countries and all ages

Have fun and enjoy the candy explosion in Candy Sweet Story before now!!!
